More About Thomas Romera

My name is Thomas Romera, I’m a French Developer, currently living in Montpellier (France).

I love to make great stuff in Ruby On Rails and C++. I am always open to learn new things, optimize my earlier stuff and talk (troll) Apple.

A little about me...

I'm a French Developer, I love to discover new things, new stuff that i can play with. I'm interested in C++, Ruby on Rails, hack myself (Personal Optimization, no drugs), French Food and good music.
